Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.jsonforms

Class JsonFormsDataUtil

java.lang.Object
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.jsonforms.JsonFormsDataUtil
public final class JsonFormsDataUtil extends Object
Utility class mainly for creating json-forms data content from a DefaultNodeSettings POJO and vice-versa. The following fields in a POJO are ignored:
  • Private fields without a getter method
  • Fields annotated with @JsonIgnore
  • Fields whose getters are annotated with. @JsonIgnore
  • Fields with null value
The translation furthermore follows these rules (from POJO to JSON; the inverse rules in the other direction):
  • "m_"-prefixes are removed.
  • Enums and BigDecimals are serialized as their string value.
  • Nested fields are translated to a nested JSON structure.
Author:
Marc Bux, KNIME GmbH, Berlin, Germany
